data.name: The Generosity Economy: Building a Generous Brand
data.summary:
Attend this session and learn:

Understand what you can contribute by stripping your offering to its most fundamental, and assess how you can leverage it
Focus on a clear and simple action that you can take. We’ll review four approaches for fitting your offering to the need of the moment
Find the right way to tell the story of your action, whether it’s in a time of crisis or in a time of peace
data.speakers:
Anita Schillhorn van Veen
Founder & Strategic Lead
Frame Strategy
Speaker
